sentences.sContent: Nora was an excellent gymnast in this country.
sentences.sContent_eng: Nora was an excellent gymnast in this country.
sentences.sCn: 诺拉是这个国家卓越的体操运动员。

sentences.sContent: I was 26 by then -- which is ancient for a male gymnast.
sentences.sContent_eng: I was 26 by then -- which is ancient for a male gymnast.
sentences.sCn: 我那时26岁，作为一名男子体操运动员已经太老了。

sentences.sContent: Ah, the perspective of the proud gymnast.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ah, the perspective of the proud gymnast.
sentences.sCn: 嘿，自以为是的体操运动员的观点。

remMethod.val: gym(健身) + nast → 体操运动员

trans.tranOther: someone who is good at gymnastics and competes against other people in gymnastics competitions
